{"step_by_step_thinking": "The cerebellum is a common site for primary brain tumors in children. The most common malignant brain tumor in children is medulloblastoma, which often presents as a midline mass in the cerebellum. Astrocytoma, glioblastoma multiforme, and ependymoma are also types of brain tumors, but they are less common in children and less likely to present as a midline cerebellar mass.", "answer_choice": "D. Medulloblastoma"}
